Until I find a new answer to what to do with my life, I am spending time reading, building, and working with good people. I enjoy reading science, exploring abstract ideas, and I write occasionally.

projects.title: Learning Buddy
projects.description: This project uses Google Apps Script to create a personal learning assistant that helps with enquiry-based learning and spaced repetition. It takes a .txt file and your reading pace as input, makes API calls to the Gemini 1.5 Flash API to generate questions based on the text, compiles the questions and answers in a Google Sheet, and sends you recent and old questions via email for effective learning.
features: Accepts .txt files and reading pace as input.
Generates questions using Gemini 1.5 Flash API based on the text content.
Compiles questions and answers in a Google Sheet.
Sends recent and old questions via email for spaced repetition and enquiry-based learning.

projects.title: Cook Intuitively
projects.description: This project helps users master the art of intuitive cooking. With a focus on teaching the 'why' behind each step, users can learn to cook without relying strictly on recipes. The project includes step-by-step video recipes, customizable plans to suit dietary needs and preferences, and a comprehensive approach to mastering ingredients and techniques.
features: Learn as you cook: Master key cooking techniques and concepts as you follow a recipe.
Adapts to you: Customize recipes to fit your dietary needs, preferences, and constraints.
Step-by-Step Video Recipes: Follow along with easy-to-understand videos for each recipe.
Personalized Cooking Plan: Get a tailored plan for what to cook based on your tastes and skill level.
Master One, Cook Many: Cook 20+ dishes from a single master recipe.
Learn the Concept: Understand the 'why' behind each step to learn to cook intuitively.
Master Ingredients: Learn how to bring out the best in each ingredient.
Culinary Mastery: Discover the secrets to cook like Grandma, from key principles to personalizing recipes with ease.

projects.title: This Portfolio
projects.description: I have been struggling to put together a website because of logistics - I am not a dev/designer. I am a PM. PMs don't really work lol. Jokes apart, things like setting up a database, hosting the project, and making sure you have assets always led to delaying this project. GPT-4o enters the chat (quite literally)! I asked GPT-4o that I wanted to put a one pager on GitHub to showcase my projects, and that led to this! There is a main index.html that references a bunch of content from content.json and other <project>.html files. It took me 4 hours to put everything together, and I am amazed by GPT-4o's (and in general all other LLMs') performance and cost.
features: Quick setup and deployment with GitHub Pages.
Uses content.json to manage project details.
Dynamic content loading with JavaScript and JSON.
Responsive design for mobile and desktop.
Seamless integration of project-specific HTML templates.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering

projects.title: Visible Light Communication
projects.description: Devised a new coding-decoding scheme for flicker mitigation over a 5kbps data-rate. Enhanced the scheme to support dimming over a 60% intensity band, limiting flickering statistically. Simulated existing modulation schemes to match BER, BW, and PSD with theoretical results. Derived PSDs analytically and numerically for various coding schemes.

projects.title: Autonomous Robots - DL1234
projects.description: Implemented vision-based localization using Logitech webcam and OpenCV's Aruco Marker-based libraries. Developed and implemented a sensor fusion model based on the Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) to improve robot localization. Used OptiTrack Motive to track robot motion and compare regular odometry-based pose with EKF-based estimated pose.
